scripts.test: npm run cy:run && npm run report:open
scripts.test:with-report: npm run test && npm run report && npm run report:open
scripts.report:open: if exist cypress\reports\mochawesome.html (start cypress\reports\mochawesome.html) else (if exist cypress\reports\*.html (for /f %%i in ('dir /b cypress\reports\*.html') do start cypress\reports\%%i) else (echo No report files found))
